answers.answer: I know this is no the answer you are looking for, but i am in exactly the same boat as you.  I am 32 and a type one diabetic.  Have been for 20 years.  I suffer the same problems as you are and its now getting to the point where i am getting nervous about meeting a new woman as the embarrassment is untrue.  I use 100m viagra which work but useless if i have had a drink and if you want spare of the moment sex with a girlfriend and produce little if any ejaculation.  I have also noticed that i no longer wake of a morning the the so called morning glory.Please let me know if you have any success on this matter,DMH21

question: I am now thirty years young with type one diabetes. I do have trouble getting erect before intercourse. I have to use pills for maximum performance which at best is still not good enough. To make matters worse for as long as I can remember I have not ejaculated after intercourse. It certainly feels like I do but I am sure that I do not produce any semen after intercourse. Is there any help that I can get to remedy this?
title: Is there any hope? Please give me some insight
